keywords.value: Chasing Portraits: A Great-Granddaughter's Quest for Her Lost Art Legacy (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Works by the doomed Polish-Jewish artist Moshe Rynecki inspired his great-granddaughter Elizabeth Rynecki to write a book and make a documentary.

headline.print_headline: Trying to Rebuild an Artist’s Legacy Lost to the Nazis
headline.main: A ‘Moral Imperative’ to Recover a Lost Art Legacy

snippet: Works by the doomed Polish-Jewish artist Moshe Rynecki inspired his great-granddaughter Elizabeth Rynecki to write a book and make a documentary....
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; memory of artist Moshe Rynecki, Polish Jew who died in Nazi concentration camp, is kept alive by Elizabeth Rynecki in upcoming book Chasing Portraits: A Great-Granddaughter's Quest for Her Lost Art Legacy, accompanying documentary film and online database of his paintings.
